   20: 
   21: -module(fun_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   24:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   25: 	 bad_apply/1,bad_fun_call/1,badarity/1,ext_badarity/1,
   26:          bad_arglist/1,
   27: 	 equality/1,ordering/1,
   28: 	 fun_to_port/1,t_phash/1,t_phash2/1,md5/1,
   29: 	 const_propagation/1,t_arity/1,t_is_function2/1,
   30: 	 t_fun_info/1,t_fun_info_mfa/1,t_fun_to_list/1]).
   31: 
   32: -export([nothing/0]).
   33: 
   34: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   35: 
   36: suite() ->
   37:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   38:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   39: 
   40: 
   41: all() ->
   42:     [bad_apply, bad_fun_call, badarity, ext_badarity,
   43:      bad_arglist,
   44:      equality, ordering, fun_to_port, t_phash,
   45:      t_phash2, md5,
   46:      const_propagation, t_arity, t_is_function2, t_fun_info,
   47:      t_fun_info_mfa,t_fun_to_list].
   48: 
   49: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   50:     Config.
   51: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   52:     erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config).
   53: 
   54: 
   55: %% Test that the correct EXIT code is returned for all types of bad funs.
   56: bad_apply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   57:     bad_apply_fc(42, [0]),
   58:     bad_apply_fc(xx, [1]),
   59:     bad_apply_fc({}, [2]),
   60:     bad_apply_fc({1}, [3]),
   61:     bad_apply_fc({1,2,3}, [4]),
   62:     bad_apply_fc({1,2,3}, [5]),
   63:     bad_apply_fc({1,2,3,4}, [6]),
   64:     bad_apply_fc({1,2,3,4,5,6}, [7]),
   65:     bad_apply_fc({1,2,3,4,5}, [8]),
   66:     bad_apply_badarg({1,2}, [9]),
   67:     ok.
   68: 
   69: bad_apply_fc(Fun, Args) ->
   70:     Res = (catch apply(Fun, Args)),
   71:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
   72:     erlang:yield(),
   73:     case Res of
   74: 	{'EXIT',{{badfun,Fun},_Where}} ->
   75: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]);
   76: 	Other ->
   77: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]),
   78: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Other})
   79:     end.
   80: 
   81: bad_apply_badarg(Fun, Args) ->
   82:     Res = (catch apply(Fun, Args)),
   83:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
   84:     erlang:yield(),
   85:     case Res of
   86: 	{'EXIT',{{badfun,Fun},_Where}} ->
   87: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]);
   88: 	Other ->
   89: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]),
   90: 	    ct:fail({bad_result, Other})
   91:     end.
   92: 
   93: %% Try directly calling bad funs.
   94: bad_fun_call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   95:     bad_call_fc(42),
   96:     bad_call_fc(xx),
   97:     bad_call_fc({}),
   98:     bad_call_fc({1}),
   99:     bad_call_fc({1,2,3}),
  100:     bad_call_fc({1,2,3}),
  101:     bad_call_fc({1,2,3,4}),
  102:     bad_call_fc({1,2,3,4,5,6}),
  103:     bad_call_fc({1,2,3,4,5}),
  104:     bad_call_fc({1,2}),
  105:     ok.
  106: 
  107: bad_call_fc(Fun) ->
  108:     Args = [some,stupid,args],
  109:     Res = (catch Fun(Fun(Args))),
  110:     case Res of
  111: 	{'EXIT',{{badfun,Fun},_Where}} ->
  112: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]);
  113: 	Other ->
  114: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]),
  115: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Other})
  116:     end.
  117: 
  118: % Test erlang:apply with non-proper arg-list
  119: bad_arglist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  120:     Fun = fun(A,B) -> A+B end,
  121:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch apply(Fun, 17)),
  122:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch apply(Fun, [17|18])),
  123:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch apply(Fun, [17,18|19])),
  124:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch apply(lists,seq, 17)),
  125:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch apply(lists,seq, [17|18])),
  126:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch apply(lists,seq, [17,18|19])),
  127:     ok.
  128: 
  129: 
  130: %% Call and apply valid funs with wrong number of arguments.
  131: 
  132: badarity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  133:     Fun = fun() -> ok end,
  134:     Stupid = {stupid,arguments},
  135:     Args = [some,{stupid,arguments},here],
  136: 
  137:     %% Simple call.
  138: 
  139:     Res = (catch Fun(some, Stupid, here)),
  140:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  141:     erlang:yield(),
  142:     case Res of
  143: 	{'EXIT',{{badarity,{Fun,Args}},_}} ->
  144: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]);
  145: 	_ ->
  146: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]),
  147: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Res})
  148:     end,
  149: 
  150:     %% Apply.
  151: 
  152:     Res2 = (catch apply(Fun, Args)),
  153:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  154:     erlang:yield(),
  155:     case Res2 of
  156: 	{'EXIT',{{badarity,{Fun,Args}},_}} ->
  157: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res2]);
  158: 	_ ->
  159: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res2]),
  160: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Res2})
  161:     end,
  162:     ok.
  163: 
  164: %% Call and apply valid external funs with wrong number of arguments.
  165: 
  166: ext_badarity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  167:     Fun = fun ?MODULE:nothing/0,
  168:     Stupid = {stupid,arguments},
  169:     Args = [some,{stupid,arguments},here],
  170: 
  171:     %% Simple call.
  172: 
  173:     Res = (catch Fun(some, Stupid, here)),
  174:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  175:     erlang:yield(),
  176:     case Res of
  177: 	{'EXIT',{{badarity,{Fun,Args}},_}} ->
  178: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]);
  179: 	_ ->
  180: 	    ok = io:format("~p(~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res]),
  181: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Res})
  182:     end,
  183: 
  184:     %% Apply.
  185: 
  186:     Res2 = (catch apply(Fun, Args)),
  187:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  188:     erlang:yield(),
  189:     case Res2 of
  190: 	{'EXIT',{{badarity,{Fun,Args}},_}} ->
  191: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res2]);
  192: 	_ ->
  193: 	    ok = io:format("apply(~p, ~p) -> ~p\n", [Fun,Args,Res2]),
  194: 	    ct:fail({bad_result,Res2})
  195:     end,
  196:     ok.
  197: 
  198: nothing() ->
  199:     ok.
  200: 
  201: %% Test equality of funs.
  202: 
  203: equality(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  204:     F0 = fun() -> 1 end,
  205:     F0_copy = copy_term(F0),
  206:     true = eq(F0, F0),
  207:     true = eq(F0, F0_copy),
  208: 
  209:     %% Compare different arities.
  210:     F1 = fun(X) -> X + 1 end,
  211:     true = eq(F1, F1),
  212:     false = eq(F0, F1),
  213:     false = eq(F0_copy, F1),
  214: 
  215:     %% Compare different environments.
  216:     G1 = make_fun(1),
  217:     G2 = make_fun(2),
  218:     true = eq(G1, G1),
  219:     true = eq(G2, G2),
  220:     false = eq(G1, G2),
  221:     false = eq(G2, G1),
  222:     G1_copy = copy_term(G1),
  223:     true = eq(G1, G1_copy),
  224: 
  225:     %% Compare fun with binaries.
  226:     B = list_to_binary([7,8,9]),
  227:     false = eq(B, G1),
  228:     false = eq(G1, B),
  229: 
  230:     %% Compare external funs.
  231:     FF0 = fun aa:blurf/0,
  232:     FF0_copy = copy_term(FF0),
  233:     FF1 = fun erlang:abs/0,
  234:     FF2 = fun erlang:exit/1,
  235:     FF3 = fun erlang:exit/2,
  236:     FF4 = fun z:ff/0,
  237: 
  238:     true = eq(FF0, FF0),
  239:     true = eq(FF0, FF0_copy),
  240:     true = eq(FF1, FF1),
  241:     true = eq(FF2, FF2),
  242:     true = eq(FF3, FF3),
  243:     true = eq(FF4, FF4),
  244:     false = eq(FF0, FF1),
  245:     false = eq(FF0, FF2),
  246:     false = eq(FF0, FF3),
  247:     false = eq(FF0, FF4),
  248:     false = eq(FF1, FF0),
  249:     false = eq(FF1, FF2),
  250:     false = eq(FF1, FF3),
  251:     false = eq(FF1, FF4),
  252:     false = eq(FF2, FF3),
  253:     false = eq(FF2, FF4),
  254:     false = eq(FF3, FF4),
  255: 
  256:     %% EEP37
  257:     H1 = fun Fact(N) when N > 0 -> N * Fact(N - 1); Fact(0) -> 1 end,
  258:     H2 = fun Pow(N, M) when M > 0 -> N * Pow(N, M - 1); Pow(_, 0) -> 1 end,
  259:     H1_copy = copy_term(H1),
  260: 
  261:     true = eq(H1, H1),
  262:     true = eq(H1, H1_copy),
  263:     true = eq(H2, H2),
  264:     false = eq(H1, H2),
  265: 
  266:     ok.
  267: 
  268: eq(X, X) -> true;
  269: eq(_, _) -> false.
  270: 
  271: copy_term(Term) ->
  272:     binary_to_term(term_to_binary(Term)).
  273: 
  274: make_fun(X) ->
  275:     fun() -> X end.
  276: 	    
  277: %% Tests ordering of funs.
  278: ordering(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  279:     F1 = make_fun(1, 2),
  280:     F1_copy = copy_term(F1),
  281:     F2 = make_fun(1, 3),
  282:     F3 = make_fun(3, 4),
  283: 
  284:     FF0 = fun aa:blurf/0,
  285:     FF1 = fun erlang:abs/0,
  286:     FF2 = fun erlang:exit/1,
  287:     FF3 = fun erlang:exit/2,
  288:     FF4 = fun z:ff/0,
  289: 
  290:     true = FF0 < FF1,
  291:     true = FF1 < FF2,
  292:     true = FF2 < FF3,
  293:     true = FF3 < FF4,
  294: 
  295:     true = FF0 > F1,
  296:     true = FF0 > F2,
  297:     true = FF0 > F3,
  298:     true = FF4 > F1,
  299:     true = FF4 > F2,
  300:     true = FF4 > F3,
  301: 
  302:     true = F1 == F1,
  303:     true = F1 == F1_copy,
  304:     true = F1 /= F2,
  305: 
  306:     true = F1 < F2,
  307:     true = F2 > F1,
  308:     true = F2 < F3,
  309:     true = F3 > F2,
  310: 
  311:     false = F1 > F2,
  312:     false = F2 > F3,
  313: 
  314:     %% Compare with binaries.
  315: 
  316:     B = list_to_binary([7,8,9,10]),
  317:     false = B == F1,
  318:     false = F1 == B,
  319: 
  320:     true = F1 < B,
  321:     true = B > F2,
  322: 
  323:     false = F1 > B,
  324:     false = B < F2,
  325: 
  326:     false = F1 >= B,
  327:     false = B =< F2,
  328: 
  329:     %% Compare module funs with binaries.
  330:     false = B == FF1,
  331:     false = FF1 == B,
  332: 
  333:     true = FF1 < B,
  334:     true = B > FF2,
  335: 
  336:     false = FF1 > B,
  337:     false = B < FF2,
  338: 
  339:     false = FF1 >= B,
  340:     false = B =< FF2,
  341: 
  342:     %% Create a port and ref.
  343: 
  344:     P = hd(erlang:ports()),
  345:     R = make_ref(),
  346: 
  347:     %% Compare funs with ports and refs.
  348: 
  349:     true = R < F3,
  350:     true = F3 > R,
  351:     true = F3 < P,
  352:     true = P > F3,
  353: 
  354:     true = R =< F3,
  355:     true = F3 >= R,
  356:     true = F3 =< P,
  357:     true = P >= F3,
  358: 
  359:     false = R > F3,
  360:     false = F3 < R,
  361:     false = F3 > P,
  362:     false = P < F3,
  363: 
  364:     %% Compare funs with conses and nils.
  365: 
  366:     true = F1 < [a],
  367:     true = F1 < [],
  368:     true = [a,b] > F1,
  369:     true = [] > F1,
  370: 
  371:     false = [1] < F1,
  372:     false = [] < F1,
  373:     false = F1 > [2],
  374:     false = F1 > [],
  375: 
  376:     false = [1] =< F1,
  377:     false = [] =< F1,
  378:     false = F1 >= [2],
  379:     false = F1 >= [],
  380: 
  381:     %% Compare module funs with conses and nils.
  382: 
  383:     true = FF1 < [a],
  384:     true = FF1 < [],
  385:     true = [a,b] > FF1,
  386:     true = [] > FF1,
  387: 
  388:     false = [1] < FF1,
  389:     false = [] < FF1,
  390:     false = FF1 > [2],
  391:     false = FF1 > [],
  392: 
  393:     false = [1] =< FF1,
  394:     false = [] =< FF1,
  395:     false = FF1 >= [2],
  396:     false = FF1 >= [],
  397:     ok.
  398: 
  399: make_fun(X, Y) ->
  400:     fun(A) -> A*X+Y end.
  401: 
  402: %% Try sending funs to ports (should fail).
  403: fun_to_port(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  404:     Port = open_port({spawn_executable, os:find_executable("erl")},
  405:                      [{args, ["-noshell", "-eval", "timer:sleep(2000)",
  406:                               "-run", "erlang", "halt"]},
  407:                       use_stdio]),
  408:     fun_to_port(Port, xxx),
  409:     fun_to_port(Port, fun() -> 42 end),
  410:     fun_to_port(Port, [fun() -> 43 end]),
  411:     fun_to_port(Port, [1,fun() -> 44 end]),
  412:     fun_to_port(Port, [0,1|fun() -> 45 end]),
  413:     B64K = build_io_list(65536),
  414:     fun_to_port(Port, [B64K,fun() -> 45 end]),
  415:     fun_to_port(Port, [B64K|fun() -> 45 end]),
  416:     unlink(Port),
  417:     exit(Port, kill),
  418:     ok.
  419: 
  420: fun_to_port(Port, IoList) ->
  421:     case catch port_command(Port, IoList) of
  422: 	{'EXIT',{badarg,_}} -> ok;
  423: 	Other -> ct:fail({unexpected_retval,Other})
  424:     end.
  425: 
  426: build_io_list(0) -> [];
  427: build_io_list(1) -> [7];
  428: build_io_list(N) ->
  429:     L = build_io_list(N div 2),
  430:     case N rem 2 of
  431: 	0 -> [L|L];
  432: 	1 -> [7,L|L]
  433:     end.
  434: 
  435: %% Test the phash/2 BIF on funs.
  436: t_phash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  437:     F1 = fun(_X) -> 1 end,
  438:     F2 = fun(_X) -> 2 end,
  439:     true = phash(F1) /= phash(F2),
  440: 
  441:     G1 = make_fun(1, 2, 3),
  442:     G2 = make_fun(1, 2, 3),
  443:     G3 = make_fun(1, 2, 4),
  444:     true = phash(G1) == phash(G2),
  445:     true = phash(G2) /= phash(G3),
  446: 
  447:     FF0 = fun erlang:abs/1,
  448:     FF1 = fun erlang:exit/1,
  449:     FF2 = fun erlang:exit/2,
  450:     FF3 = fun blurf:exit/2,
  451:     true = phash(FF0) =/= phash(FF1),
  452:     true = phash(FF0) =/= phash(FF2),
  453:     true = phash(FF0) =/= phash(FF3),
  454:     true = phash(FF1) =/= phash(FF2),
  455:     true = phash(FF1) =/= phash(FF3),
  456:     true = phash(FF2) =/= phash(FF3),
  457:     ok.
  458: 
  459: phash(Term) ->
  460:     erlang:phash(Term, 16#7ffffff).
  461: 
  462: %% Test the phash2/2 BIF on funs.
  463: t_phash2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  464:     F1 = fun(_X) -> 1 end,
  465:     F2 = fun(_X) -> 2 end,
  466:     true = phash2(F1) /= phash2(F2),
  467: 
  468:     G1 = make_fun(1, 2, 3),
  469:     G2 = make_fun(1, 2, 3),
  470:     G3 = make_fun(1, 2, 4),
  471:     true = phash2(G1) == phash2(G2),
  472:     true = phash2(G2) /= phash2(G3),
  473: 
  474:     FF0 = fun erlang:abs/1,
  475:     FF1 = fun erlang:exit/1,
  476:     FF2 = fun erlang:exit/2,
  477:     FF3 = fun blurf:exit/2,
  478:     true = phash2(FF0) =/= phash2(FF1),
  479:     true = phash2(FF0) =/= phash2(FF2),
  480:     true = phash2(FF0) =/= phash2(FF3),
  481:     true = phash2(FF1) =/= phash2(FF2),
  482:     true = phash2(FF1) =/= phash2(FF3),
  483:     true = phash2(FF2) =/= phash2(FF3),
  484:     
  485:     ok.
  486: 
  487: phash2(Term) ->
  488:     erlang:phash2(Term, 16#7ffffff).
  489: 
  490: make_fun(X, Y, Z) ->
  491:     fun() -> {X,Y,Z} end.
  492: 
  493: %% Test that MD5 bifs reject funs properly.
  494: md5(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  495:     _ = size(erlang:md5_init()),
  496: 
  497:     %% Try funs in the i/o list.
  498:     bad_md5(fun(_X) -> 42 end),
  499:     bad_md5([fun(_X) -> 43 end]),
  500:     bad_md5([1,fun(_X) -> 44 end]),
  501:     bad_md5([1|fun(_X) -> 45 end]),
  502:     B64K = build_io_list(65536),
  503:     bad_md5([B64K,fun(_X) -> 46 end]),
  504:     bad_md5([B64K|fun(_X) -> 46 end]),
  505:     ok.
  506:     
  507: bad_md5(Bad) ->
  508:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:md5(Bad)).
  509: 
  510: fun_refc(F) ->
  511:     {refc,Count} = erlang:fun_info(F, refc),
  512:     Count.
  513: 
  514: const_propagation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  515:     Fun1 = fun wait_until/1,
  516:     1 = fun_refc(Fun1),
  517:     Fun2 = Fun1,
  518:     my_cmp({Fun1,Fun2}),
  519: 
  520:     Fun3 = fun() -> ok end,
  521:     1 = fun_refc(Fun3),
  522:     Fun4 = Fun3,
  523:     my_cmp({Fun3,Fun4}),
  524:     ok.
  525: 
  526: my_cmp({Fun,Fun}) -> ok;
  527: my_cmp({Fun1,Fun2}) ->
  528:     io:format("Fun1: ~p", [erlang:fun_info(Fun1)]),
  529:     io:format("Fun2: ~p", [erlang:fun_info(Fun2)]),
  530:     ct:fail(no_match).
  531: 
  532: t_arity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  533:     0 = fun_arity(fun() -> ok end),
  534:     0 = fun_arity(fun() -> Config end),
  535:     1 = fun_arity(fun(X) -> X+1 end),
  536:     1 = fun_arity(fun(X) -> Config =:= X end),
  537:     A = id(42),
  538: 
  539:     %% Test that the arity is transferred properly.
  540:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  541:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  542:     hello_world = spawn_call(Node, fun() -> hello_world end),
  543:     0 = spawn_call(Node, fun(X) -> X end),
  544:     42 = spawn_call(Node, fun(_X) -> A end),
  545:     43 = spawn_call(Node, fun(X, Y) -> A+X+Y end),
  546:     1 = spawn_call(Node, fun(X, Y) -> X+Y end),
  547:     45 = spawn_call(Node, fun(X, Y, Z) -> A+X+Y+Z end),
  548:     peer:stop(Peer),
  549:     ok.
  550: 
  551: t_is_function2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  552:     false = is_function(id({a,b}), 0),
  553:     false = is_function(id({a,b}), 234343434333433433),
  554:     true = is_function(id(fun() -> ok end), 0),
  555:     true = is_function(id(fun(_) -> ok end), 1),
  556:     false = is_function(id(fun(_) -> ok end), 0),
  557: 
  558:     true = is_function(id(fun erlang:abs/1), 1),
  559:     true = is_function(id(fun erlang:abs/99), 99),
  560:     false = is_function(id(fun erlang:abs/1), 0),
  561:     false = is_function(id(fun erlang:abs/99), 0),
  562: 
  563:     false = is_function(id(self()), 0),
  564:     false = is_function(id({a,b,c}), 0),
  565:     false = is_function(id({a}), 0),
  566:     false = is_function(id([a,b,c]), 0),
  567: 
  568:     %% Larger arities.
  569:     F16 = id(fun f/16),
  570:     F255 = id(fun f/255),
  571: 
  572:     false = is_function(id(self()), 16),
  573:     true = is_function(F16, 16),
  574:     ok = id(if is_function(F16, 16) -> ok; true -> error end),
  575:     false = is_function(F255, 16),
  576:     error = id(if is_function(F255, 16) -> ok; true -> error end),
  577: 
  578:     false = is_function(id(self()), 255),
  579:     true = is_function(F255, 255),
  580:     false = is_function(F16, 255),
  581:     error = id(if is_function(F16, 255) -> ok; true -> error end),
  582:     ok = id(if is_function(F255, 255) -> ok; true -> error end),
  583: 
  584:     %% Bad arity argument.
  585:     bad_arity(a),
  586:     bad_arity(-1),
  587:     bad_arity(-9738974938734938793873498378),
  588:     bad_arity([]),
  589:     bad_arity(fun() -> ok end),
  590:     bad_arity({}),
  591:     bad_arity({a,b}),
  592:     bad_arity(self()),
  593: 
  594:     %% Bad arity argument in guard test.
  595:     Fun = id(fun erlang:abs/1),
  596:     ok = if
  597:              is_function(Fun, -1) -> error;
  598:              is_function(Fun, 256) -> error;
  599:              is_function(Fun, a) -> error;
  600:              is_function(Fun, Fun) -> error;
  601:              true -> ok
  602:          end,
  603:     ok.
  604: 
  605: f(_A1, _A2, _A3, _A4, _A5, _A6, _A7, _A8,
  606:   _A9, _A10, _A11, _A12, _A13, _A14, _A15, _A16) ->
  607:     ok.
  608: 
  609: f(_A1, _A2, _A3, _A4, _A5, _A6, _A7, _A8,
  610:   _A9, _A10, _A11, _A12, _A13, _A14, _A15, _A16,
  611:   _A17, _A18, _A19, _A20, _A21, _A22, _A23, _A24,
  612:   _A25, _A26, _A27, _A28, _A29, _A30, _A31, _A32,
  613:   _A33, _A34, _A35, _A36, _A37, _A38, _A39, _A40,
  614:   _A41, _A42, _A43, _A44, _A45, _A46, _A47, _A48,
  615:   _A49, _A50, _A51, _A52, _A53, _A54, _A55, _A56,
  616:   _A57, _A58, _A59, _A60, _A61, _A62, _A63, _A64,
  617:   _A65, _A66, _A67, _A68, _A69, _A70, _A71, _A72,
  618:   _A73, _A74, _A75, _A76, _A77, _A78, _A79, _A80,
  619:   _A81, _A82, _A83, _A84, _A85, _A86, _A87, _A88,
  620:   _A89, _A90, _A91, _A92, _A93, _A94, _A95, _A96,
  621:   _A97, _A98, _A99, _A100, _A101, _A102, _A103, _A104,
  622:   _A105, _A106, _A107, _A108, _A109, _A110, _A111, _A112,
  623:   _A113, _A114, _A115, _A116, _A117, _A118, _A119, _A120,
  624:   _A121, _A122, _A123, _A124, _A125, _A126, _A127, _A128,
  625:   _A129, _A130, _A131, _A132, _A133, _A134, _A135, _A136,
  626:   _A137, _A138, _A139, _A140, _A141, _A142, _A143, _A144,
  627:   _A145, _A146, _A147, _A148, _A149, _A150, _A151, _A152,
  628:   _A153, _A154, _A155, _A156, _A157, _A158, _A159, _A160,
  629:   _A161, _A162, _A163, _A164, _A165, _A166, _A167, _A168,
  630:   _A169, _A170, _A171, _A172, _A173, _A174, _A175, _A176,
  631:   _A177, _A178, _A179, _A180, _A181, _A182, _A183, _A184,
  632:   _A185, _A186, _A187, _A188, _A189, _A190, _A191, _A192,
  633:   _A193, _A194, _A195, _A196, _A197, _A198, _A199, _A200,
  634:   _A201, _A202, _A203, _A204, _A205, _A206, _A207, _A208,
  635:   _A209, _A210, _A211, _A212, _A213, _A214, _A215, _A216,
  636:   _A217, _A218, _A219, _A220, _A221, _A222, _A223, _A224,
  637:   _A225, _A226, _A227, _A228, _A229, _A230, _A231, _A232,
  638:   _A233, _A234, _A235, _A236, _A237, _A238, _A239, _A240,
  639:   _A241, _A242, _A243, _A244, _A245, _A246, _A247, _A248,
  640:   _A249, _A250, _A251, _A252, _A253, _A254, _A255) ->
  641:     ok.
  642: 
  643: bad_arity(A) ->
  644:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch is_function(fun() -> ok end, A)),
  645:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch is_function(no_fun, A)),
  646:     ok.
  647: 
  648: t_fun_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  649:     F = fun t_fun_info/1,
  650:     try F(blurf) of
  651: 	      FAny ->
  652: 		  ct:fail("should fail; returned ~p\n", [FAny])
  653: 	  catch
  654: 	      error:function_clause -> ok
  655: 	  end,
  656:     {module,?MODULE} = erlang:fun_info(F, module),
  657:     case erlang:fun_info(F, name) of
  658: 	      undefined ->
  659: 		  ct:fail(no_fun_info);
  660: 	      _ -> ok
  661: 	  end,
  662:     {arity,1} = erlang:fun_info(F, arity),
  663:     {env,[]} = erlang:fun_info(F, env),
  664:     verify_not_undef(F, index),
  665:     verify_not_undef(F, uniq),
  666:     verify_not_undef(F, new_index),
  667:     verify_not_undef(F, new_uniq),
  668:     verify_not_undef(F, refc),
  669:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch erlang:fun_info(F, blurf)),    
  670: 
  671:     %% Module fun.
  672:     FF = fun ?MODULE:t_fun_info/1,
  673:     try FF(blurf) of
  674: 	      FFAny ->
  675: 		  ct:fail("should fail; returned ~p\n", [FFAny])
  676: 	  catch
  677: 	      error:function_clause -> ok
  678: 	  end,
  679: 
  680:     {module,?MODULE} = erlang:fun_info(FF, module),
  681:     {name,t_fun_info} = erlang:fun_info(FF, name),
  682:     {arity,1} = erlang:fun_info(FF, arity),
  683:     {env,[]} = erlang:fun_info(FF, env),
  684:     verify_undef(FF, index),
  685:     verify_undef(FF, uniq),
  686:     verify_undef(FF, new_index),
  687:     verify_undef(FF, new_uniq),
  688:     verify_undef(FF, refc),
  689:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch erlang:fun_info(FF, blurf)),
  690: 
  691:     %% Not fun.
  692:     bad_info(abc),
  693:     bad_info(42),
  694:     bad_info({fun erlang:list_to_integer/1}),
  695:     bad_info([42]),
  696:     bad_info([]),
  697:     bad_info(self()),
  698:     bad_info(<<>>),
  699:     bad_info(<<1,2>>),
  700:     ok.
  701: 
  702: t_fun_info_mfa(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  703:     Fun1 = fun spawn_call/2,
  704:     {module,M1}  = erlang:fun_info(Fun1, module),
  705:     {name,F1}    = erlang:fun_info(Fun1, name),
  706:     {arity,A1}   = erlang:fun_info(Fun1, arity),
  707:     {M1,F1,A1=2} = erlang:fun_info_mfa(Fun1),
  708:     %% Module fun.
  709:     Fun2 = fun ?MODULE:t_fun_info/1,
  710:     {module,M2}  = erlang:fun_info(Fun2, module),
  711:     {name,F2}    = erlang:fun_info(Fun2, name),
  712:     {arity,A2}   = erlang:fun_info(Fun2, arity),
  713:     {M2,F2,A2=1} = erlang:fun_info_mfa(Fun2),
  714: 
  715:     %% Not fun.
  716:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch erlang:fun_info_mfa(id(d))),
  717:     ok.
  718: 
  719: t_fun_to_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  720:     "fun a:b/1" = erlang:fun_to_list(fun a:b/1),
  721:     "fun 'a-esc':'b-esc'/1" = erlang:fun_to_list(fun 'a-esc':'b-esc'/1),
  722:     "fun 'a-esc':b/1" = erlang:fun_to_list(fun 'a-esc':b/1),
  723:     "fun a:'b-esc'/1" = erlang:fun_to_list(fun a:'b-esc'/1),
  724:     ok.
  725: 
  726: bad_info(Term) ->
  727:     try	erlang:fun_info(Term, module) of
  728: 	Any ->
  729: 	    ict:fail("should fail; returned ~p\n", [Any])
  730:     catch
  731: 	error:badarg -> ok
  732:     end.
  733: 
  734: verify_undef(Fun, Tag) ->
  735:     {Tag,undefined} = erlang:fun_info(Fun, Tag).
  736: 
  737: verify_not_undef(Fun, Tag) ->
  738:     case erlang:fun_info(Fun, Tag) of
  739: 	{Tag,undefined} ->
  740: 	    ct:fail("tag ~w not defined in fun_info", [Tag]);
  741: 	{Tag,_} -> ok
  742:     end.
  743: 
  744: id(X) ->
  745:     X.
  746: 
  747: spawn_call(Node, AFun) ->
  748:     Self = self(),
  749:     Pid = spawn_link(Node,
  750: 		     fun() ->
  751: 			     receive
  752: 				 {Fun,Fun,Fun} when is_function(Fun) ->
  753: 				     Arity = fun_arity(Fun),
  754: 				     Args = case Arity of
  755: 						0 -> [];
  756: 						_ -> lists:seq(0, Arity-1)
  757: 					    end,
  758: 				     Res = apply(Fun, Args),
  759:                                      Self ! {result,Res}
  760: 			     end
  761: 		     end),
  762:     Pid ! {AFun,AFun,AFun},
  763:     Res = receive
  764: 	      {result,R} -> R;
  765: 	      Other -> ct:fail({bad_message,Other})
  766: 	  after 10000 ->
  767: 		  ct:fail(timeout_waiting_for_result)
  768: 	  end,
  769:     receive
  770: 	{'EXIT',Pid,normal} -> ok;
  771: 	Other2 -> ct:fail({bad_message_waiting_for_exit,Other2})
  772:     after 10000 ->
  773: 	    ct:fail(timeout_waiting_for_exit)
  774:     end,
  775:     Res.
  776: 
  777: fun_arity(F) ->
  778:     {arity,Arity} = erlang:fun_info(F, arity),
  779:     Arity.
  780: 
  781: wait_until(Fun) ->
  782:     case catch Fun() of
  783: 	true -> ok;
  784: 	_ -> receive after 100 -> wait_until(Fun) end
  785:     end.
